doc:
Brian Klugman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brian_Klugman 0 Brian Klugman (born September 15, 1975) is an American actor, screenwriter, and director. In 2012 he debuted as a co-director with Lee Sternthal on the film The Words, which they both co-wrote as well. Brian_Klugman ( born September_15_,_1975 ) is an_American_actor , screenwriter , and director . In 2012 he debuted as a_co-director with Lee_Sternthal on the_film The_Words , which they both co-wrote as_well .
